column1: Little Goat Diner////THE HOLY GRAIL. I love this place and the waitresses/hostess!!! (if you are reading this
column2: you guys are amazing) very thoughtful and attentive. I live in NYC and I hope and pray they'll open up a Little Goat in NYC. I'd go there 8 out of 7 days. Their blueberry pancakes
column3: TO DIE FOR. but my all time fave is the Presley waffle... if you love peanut butter and waffles... get it. They have the best hash browns also! AND DRUM ROLLS!!!! THEY HAVE BARISTA SPECIALS!!!! Get yourself a cup of coffee
column4: ask about the Barista's special... they NEVER fail to lift my spirit!
